import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Button, Container, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { login } from '../actions/userAction' export const CreateProject = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email, password)) } return (
